about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Learn more about my journey and passion for development
about.description: I'm an Information Technology Engineer with experience in full-stack development of web and mobile applications. I developed and implemented a teacher evaluation system currently in production at ISTLA and have participated in academic, social, and professional projects as a developer and UX/UI designer. I seek to continue growing as a Full Stack Developer and contribute to high-impact projects.
